title: Clinical Practice Guidelines for Neck Pain Management: Online Interactive Module-Based Training for Large-Scale Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and clinical assessment knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended education program for healthcare professionals conducted in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Based on clinical practice guidelines, assessment and diagnostic plans for patients with neck pain can be established.
Evidence-based treatment approaches can be applied to develop a neck pain management protocol.
Interactive modules can be used to integrate learning content into real-world clinical cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
